#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int e,f,n;
        scanf("%d %d",&e,&f);
        int k=f-e;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        int v[n];
        int w[n];
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            scanf("%d %d",&v[i],&w[i]);
        }
        int temp[k+1];
        temp[0]=0;
        for(int i=1;i<=k;i++)
        {
            if(i%w[0]==0)
                temp[i]=temp[i-w[0]] + v[0];
            else temp[i]=1000000000;
        }
        int array[k+1];
        for(int i=1;i<n;i++)
        {
            for(int j=0;j<=k;j++)
            {
                if(j<w[i])
                    array[j]=temp[j];
                else
                    array[j] = min(temp[j],array[j-w[i]]+v[i]);
            }
            for(int j=0;j<=k;j++)
                temp[j] = array[j];
        }
        if(array[k]!=1000000000)
            printf("%s%d%s\n","The minimum amount of money in the piggy-bank is ",array[k],".");
        else printf("%s\n","This is impossible.");
    }
    return 0;
}
